articles.title: Coty Names P&G Veteran as Interim CEO Amid Beauty Shake-Up
articles.mainIdea: Coty Names P&G Veteran as Interim CEO Amid Beauty Shake-Up
articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: Coty Names P&G Veteran as Interim CEO Amid Beauty Shake-Up. Cosmetics giant Coty has appointed Markus Strobel as interim chief executive and board chair, effective Jan. 1. Related tickers mentioned: COTY, PG.

articles.title: Here are the 10 hedge funds to watch in 2026

articles.summary: Business Insider: Here are the 10 hedge funds to watch in 2026. Entering 2026, managers to watch include giants with new products like Point72 and players making a name for themselves, like Ning Jin
